title: Filipino tamarind pork soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (1.25cm) piece fresh ginger, chopped', '2 plum tomatoes, cut into 1.25cm dice', '450g bone-in pork chops', '950ml water or more if needed', '1 (40g) packet tamarind soup mix, such as Knorr', '225g fresh green beans, trimmed']
